title: Keurig K-Compact Single-Serve K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker, Black (Packaging May Vary)
descriptions: Introducing the Keurig K-Compact Single-Serve K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker in Black. This coffee maker is designed with convenience and space-saving in mind. With a slender and stylish design, it fits perfectly on your countertop without sacrificing any functionality. Brew your favorite beverages in just under a minute with cup sizes of 6, 8, or 10 oz. Choose from a wide selection of K-Cup pod varieties, including coffee, tea, hot cocoa, and more. The Smart Start feature makes brewing even easier by heating and brewing in one simple process. The removable drip tray accommodates travel mugs up to 7.0 inches tall, and the 36 oz. removable water reservoir allows for multiple cups before refilling. Enjoy energy efficiency with the auto off feature that turns off the coffee maker 2 hours after your last brew. Additionally, dispense hot water on demand by simply opening and closing the brewer handle and selecting your cup size. Don't miss out on the delicious taste and unmatched convenience of the Keurig K-Compact Single-Serve K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker.

Introducing the Keurig K-Compact Single-Serve K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker. This sleek and stylish coffee maker offers a space-saving design without compromising on taste or convenience. With its compact size of just over 8 inches wide, it easily fits on any countertop. Brew your favorite beverages in 6, 8, or 10 oz. sizes in under a minute. Choose from a wide variety of K-Cup pod flavors, or use your own ground coffee with the Keurig Universal My K-Cup Reusable Coffee Filter (sold separately). The Smart Start feature heats and brews your coffee in one simple process, so you can enjoy your cup faster. The removable drip tray accommodates travel mugs, and the 36 oz. water reservoir allows for multiple cups before refilling. Plus, the auto off feature saves energy by turning off the coffee maker after 2 hours of inactivity. Experience the convenience and delicious taste of Keurig with the K-Compact Single-Serve Coffee Maker.

generation_prompt_text:
Write an advertising description for the following product. Use the existing description below as a guideline, matching it roughly in quality and level of detail. Do not include information not available in the description below. Do not directly plagiarize the description below. Be concise and informative. Assume potential buyers who read the ad have access to a photo of the product, and are scanning through many different similar advertisements, spending little time on each, and that they value being able to quickly see the most important details.

---

Title: Keurig K-Compact Single-Serve K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker, Black (Packaging May Vary)

Description: BREWS MULTIPLE CUP SIZES: (6, 8, 10 oz.). Enjoy the most popular cup sizes. Use the 6 oz. cup size to achieve the strongest brew.

COFFEE IN NO TIME: Brews K-Cup pods in under a minute.

A COMPACT MULTI-CUP RESERVOIR: 36 oz. removable water reservoir make refilling easy.

SMART START: Your coffee maker heats then brews in one simple process. No need to wait for it to heat before selecting your cup size.

SIMPLE BUTTON CONTROLS: Just insert a pod, select your desired cup brew size, and brew a great-tasting cup in under a minute.

ENERGY EFFICIENT: Auto off feature turns the coffee maker off 2 hours after your last brew, helping to save energy.

REMOVABLE DRIP TRAY: Removable drip tray accommodates travel mugs up to 7.0 inches tall, and holds a full accidental brew for easy cleanup.

DISPENSE HOT WATER: Open and close the brewer handle (without a pod) and select your cup size for hot water on demand.

Space saving. Crowd-pleasing. The slender and stylish Keurig K-Compact single serve coffee maker offers consumers a space-saving design to fit their countertop, but still delivers the delicious taste and unparalleled convenience that the Keurig brand is known for. Designed to leave the smallest footprint possible, the Keurig K-Compact brewer in Black is just over 8 inches wide, leaving you plenty of space on your countertop without sacrificing a thing. Brew 6, 8, or 10 oz. of your favorite beverages in under a minute. Choose from hundreds of delicious K-Cup pod varieties coffee, tea, hot cocoa, iced beverages, and more and enjoy a perfect cup, every time. Or brew your own ground coffee with the Keurig Universal My K-Cup Reusable Coffee Filter (not included). The Smart Start feature heats and then brews in one simple process for even more convenience. The K-Compact brewer has a removable drip tray to accommodate travel mugs, and its 36 oz. removable water reservoir allows you to brew multiple cups before refilling.
